HostNamaste – OpenVZ VPS from $15/year in Jacksonville, Florida, USA and France, Europe Locations

florida, france, hostnamaste, jacksonville, openvz, roubaix June 14, 2020 @ 6:45 am, by Jon Biloh

HostNamaste is back with a great summer offer on their OpenVZ lineup – with both a 1GB and 2GB VPS on sale via this exclusive LowEndBox deal. Over the past year HostNamaste has been featured on Low End Box a few times, to generally positive reviews.

They are a registered business in the state of Rajkot, Gujarat, India and currently accept PayPal, Credit/Debit, Alipay, WebMoney, Payoneer, Wallets and other payment methods. If you are interested check out their ToS/Legal Docs and their AUP.

Here’s what they had to say, in their own words: 

“HostNamaste is a company that was started in March 2016 and has continued to offer hosting ever since. We are focused primarily in the LowEnd market, but it is our philosophy to provide quality services while within the LowEnd market’s price range. While this is certainly the goal of many LowEnd hosting companies, we have been quietly providing our services for nearly 4 years with no complaints or issues whatsoever. We are particularly proud to offer many features that cannot often be offered by many LowEnd companies, including 24.7 support, a 30-day money back guarantee, RAID-10 disks and dual processor nodes.

We are delighted to announce a brand new data center locations to the HostNamaste lineup – Moscow Russia Datacenter and Mumbai Maharashtra, India Datacenter. These facilities feature the highest levels of redundancy across all Russia and India, Asia. The low latency connectivity to the nearest location makes it the optimal choice for any business that is focused on high server uptime and network performance. If your customers are located in Russia and India, Asia, we would recommend that you try our affordable, reliable, cheapest and the best in performance Russia OpenVZ 7 VPS and India OpenVZ 7 VPS hosting solutions today. The hosting servers are configured with the highly optimized web server technology and powered by Dual Intel E5 Xeon Processors. You can now deliver the blazing fast website experience to your Russian and Indian, Asian users with the latency benefit from our servers. “

Here are their offers: 

OpenVZ 1GB

  • 1024 MB Memory
  • 1024 MB vSWAP
  • 30 GB Storage
  • 1 TB Bandwidth
  • 1 x CPU Cores
  • 1 x IPv4 Address
  • 1 x IPv6 Address
  • 500Mbps to 1Gbps Uplink
  • OpenVZ + SolusVM
  • TUN/TAP/PPP Supported
  • PTR/rDNS Supported
  • Multiple Operating Systems
  • $15/Year
  • Coupon: 1GB-OVZ-US-FRANCE
  • [ORDER NOW]

OpenVZ 2GB

  • 2048 MB Memory
  • 2048 MB vSWAP
  • 50 GB Storage
  • 2 TB Bandwidth
  • 2 x CPU Cores
  • 1 x IPv4 Address
  • 1 x IPv6 Address
  • 500Mbps to 1Gbps Uplink
  • OpenVZ + SolusVM
  • TUN/TAP/PPP Supported
  • PTR/rDNS Supported
  • Multiple Operating Systems
  • $30/Year
  • Coupon: 2GB-OVZ-US-FRANCE
  • [ORDER NOW]

All options include:

  • Multiple O/S Choices
  • Complete Root Access
  • OpenVZ 7 with SolusVM control panel
  • PTR / rDNS support
